content.title: Vocational Training Of Destitute Women And Adolescent Girls
content.department: Social Welfare Department, Govt. of Manipur
content.details: Vocational Training of Destitute Women and Adolescent Girls is a scheme by the Social Welfare Department, Govt. of Manipur. In this scheme, a 6-months training is provided in the Trades such as Tailoring & Cutting, Embroidery, and Computer. The application form can be collected from the Welfare Training Institute, Takyel, or can be downloaded from the Department website www.socialwelfare.mn.gov.in. The completely filled and signed application forms should be submitted to the Office of Welfare Training Institute, Takyel. This is a State Sponsored Scheme and only the citizens who are domiciled in the State of Manipur can apply for this scheme. The application should be submitted through the respective District Social Welfare Officer.
benefits: A 6-months training is provided in the Trades such as Tailoring & Cutting, Embroidery, and Computer.
eligibility: The applicant should be a domicile of the state of Manipur.
The applicant should be a Destitute Woman or an Adolescent Girl.
The applicant should be in the 18 to 38 years age group.
The Minimum Educational qualification for Computer Course is 12th Pass.
content.application_process: Offline. The application form can be downloaded from the Departmentâ€™s website or collected from the District Social Welfare Offices. Fill in the mandatory fields of the Application Form, attach the supporting documents and the passport-sized photograph, and submit the form to the Office of the District Social Welfare Officer concerned.
documents_required: Residential / Domicile Certificate of the state of Manipur.
Proof of Age / Date of Birth.
Marriage Certificate (in the case of Destitute Woman).

faqs.question: Which Department Manages The Scheme 'Vocational Training Of Destitute Women And Adolescent Girls'?
faqs.answer: The scheme 'Vocational Training Of Destitute Women And Adolescent Girls' is managed by the Social Welfare Department, Govt. of Manipur.

faqs.question: Can Transgenders Also Apply To This Scheme?
faqs.answer: No, only Destitute Women And Adolescent Girls can apply to this scheme.

faqs.question: Is This Scheme State Sponsored Or Centrally Sponsored?
faqs.answer: This is a State Sponsored scheme.

faqs.question: Does This Scheme Accept Online Applications?
faqs.answer: No, this scheme only accepts offline applications.

faqs.question: Can A Domicile Of Nagaland Apply To This Scheme?
faqs.answer: No, only the domicile of the state of Manipur can apply.

faqs.question: What Are The Age Criteria For This Scheme?
faqs.answer: The applicant should be in the 18 to 38 years age group.

faqs.question: What Should Be The Minimum Educational Qualification For A Destitute Woman Who Wishes To Pursue The Computer Course?
faqs.answer: The Minimum Educational qualification for Computer Course is 12th Pass.

faqs.question: What Are The Trades Under Which The Training Is Provided?
faqs.answer: The trades under which the training is provided are Tailoring & Cutting, Embroidery, and Computer.

faqs.question: What Shall Be The Duration Of The Training?
faqs.answer: The duration of the training shall be 6 months.

faqs.question: What Are The Income Criteria For This Scheme?
faqs.answer: There are no income-related criteria for this scheme.

faqs.question: To Whom Shall The Application Be Addressed?
faqs.answer: The completely filled and signed application forms should be addressed to the Office of Welfare Training Institute, Takyel.

faqs.question: What Is The URL Of The Website Of The Social Welfare Department, Govt. Of Manipur?
faqs.answer: The URL of the website of the Social Welfare Department, Govt. of Manipur is www.socialwelfare.mn.gov.in.

faqs.question: Is There Any Financial Assistance Provided In This Scheme?
faqs.answer: No financial assistance is provided in this scheme.

faqs.question: What Documents Are Required To Be Submitted Along With The Application Form?
faqs.answer: The following self-attested documents are required to be submitted along with the application form: Residential / Domicile Certificate of the state of Manipur, Details of the Bank Account, Aadhaar Card, Passing Certificate / Marksheet of Class 12th, Proof of Identity, Proof of Age / Date of Birth, Marriage Certificate (in the case of a Destitute Woman).

faqs.question: What Additional Documents Are Required In The Case Of A Destitute Woman?
faqs.answer: In the case of a Destitute Woman, the Marriage Certificate is also needed to be submitted with the application.
